<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request parameters for the update_did endpoint","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Update a `DID`'s name and visibility settings","required":["did_id","visible"],"properties":{"did_id":{"type":"string","description":"The `DID` ID to update","example":"did:chia:..."},"name":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"Optional new name for the `DID`","example":"My Identity"},"visible":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the `DID` should be visible in the UI","example":true}},"title":"UpdateDid"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
